edges.description: Dirk and Richard met in College. Dirk helps Richard avoid the law when under suspicion
Gordon is Richard's boss
Richard and Reg know each other well from mentoring sessions in college.
Richard and Susan are dating
Gordon and Susan are brother and sister.

The Electric Monk murders Gordon.

"Certainly the reaction of the person he had shot off at had seemed a little extreme." (128)
The Monk is accidentally sent through time and space
Reg's apartment is a time machine
Gordon's ghost can only rest once he's phoned Sarah
The time machine breaks when the phone in it gets fixed
Gordon is shot by the Electric Monk
Gordon called everybody to talk out ideas
Gordon is the CEO of WayForward Technologies
Richard writes software for WayForward Technologies
The Alien tried to take control of the electric monk
The Alien tried to take control of Richard
Susan was supposed to meet reg, but Richard forgets to pick her up

Reg uses his time machine recreationally.

"You have a time machine and yo use it for ... watching television?" (201)
The alien suggested entering the door to Earth to the monk as an attempt to possess it
The alien uses Reg's time machine to fix their mistake, before Dirk realizes the alien's true intentions
The alien suggests stealing Susan's answering machine tape
Richard's software turns data into music
Susan is a professional cellist
Micheal used to be the editor for Fathom magazine
Richard writes an article for Fathom after Micheal is fired

Richard and Micheal are coworkers, and have an uneasy relationship.

"[Micheal was] known by some people as Micheal Wednesday-Week, because that was when he usually promised to have things done by." (91)
The Alien possesses Micheal after he murders his replacement
Dirk realizes The Alien's plan to end humanity
Dirk interrupts Richard from comforting Susan about Gordon's death

Gordon's Ghost scares Richard while he drives from Cambridge to apologize to Susan

"I was just driving along and I suddenly imagined that I saw my employer throwing himself in front of my car." (79)
Susan has a bad night out with Micheal after deciding it was a better option than waiting for Richard
